archived_alerts.message: FDA APPROVED ZYCUBO on Jan 13 (1 day early). Catalyst occurred - FULL EXIT required immediately.

details.catalyst_outcome: APPROVED - First and only treatment for Menkes disease

archived_alerts.resolution: Position closed via market order at $3.86. Final P&L: -$35.67 (-9.6%). Post-mortem completed.

metadata.description: Acknowledged alerts moved from alerts.json for historical record
